code:
---
accTitle: ProspectPro API Integration Swimlane
accDescr: Interactions between frontend, middleware, backend, external services, and storage
domain: app-source
type: flowchart
title: API Integration Swimlane
index: ../../mmd-shared/config/index.md
---







%%{IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker} }%%
flowchart TD
  classDef lane fill:#2a2a2a,stroke:#f5f5f5,color:#f5f5f5,stroke-width:2px

  subgraph frontend[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
    UserAction[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    FormValidation[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    LoadingState[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    ResultDisplay[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
    ErrorHandling[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
  end

  subgraph middleware[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    APIClient[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    RequestInterceptor[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    ResponseInterceptor[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    RetryLogic[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    CacheManager[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
  end

  subgraph backend[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    EdgeFunction[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    AuthMiddleware[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    ValidationLayer[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
    BusinessLogic[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
    DatabaseORM[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
  end

  subgraph external[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
    GooglePlaces[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    HunterIO[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    NeverBounce[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    CobaltIntel[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
  end

  subgraph storage[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    PostgreSQL[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    FileStorage[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    Cache[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    SearchIndex[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
  end

  UserAction --> FormValidation --> LoadingState --> APIClient
  APIClient --> RequestInterceptor --> EdgeFunction
  EdgeFunction --> ResponseInterceptor --> CacheManager --> ResultDisplay
  EdgeFunction --> AuthMiddleware --> ValidationLayer --> BusinessLogic --> DatabaseORM
  BusinessLogic --> GooglePlaces
  BusinessLogic --> HunterIO
  BusinessLogic --> NeverBounce
  BusinessLogic --> CobaltIntel
  DatabaseORM --> PostgreSQL
  BusinessLogic --> FileStorage
  CacheManager --> Cache
  BusinessLogic --> SearchIndex
  ResponseInterceptor -.-> RetryLogic -.-> ErrorHandling
  EdgeFunction -.-> ErrorHandling
  CacheManager -.-> Cache -.-> ResultDisplay

  class UserAction,FormValidation,LoadingState,ResultDisplay,ErrorHandling lane
  class APIClient,RequestInterceptor,ResponseInterceptor,RetryLogic,CacheManager lane
  class EdgeFunction,AuthMiddleware,ValidationLayer,BusinessLogic,DatabaseORM lane
  class GooglePlaces,HunterIO,NeverBounce,CobaltIntel lane
  class PostgreSQL,FileStorage,Cache,SearchIndex lane

  click PostgreSQL "database-schema.mmd" "Inspect database schema"
  click BusinessLogic "prospect-discovery-journey.mmd" "Trace prospect journey"
  click APIClient "frontend-modules.mmd" "Review frontend modules"

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 然后，流程会走到 IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker 和 IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream。

收到。这是不是一个判断条件？我暂时写成 'IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker处理'。
可以，继续吧。
